distinct
from gardenstuff
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:

gardenstuff_id = #{record.gardenstuffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT g.gardenstuff_id gardenstuffId, g.gardenstuff_peasantid gardenstuffPeasantid, g.gardenstuff_name gardenstuffName, g.gardenstuff_price gardenstuffPrice, g.gardenstuff_category gardenstuffCategory, g.gardenstuff_categoryname gardenstuffCategoryname, g.gardenstuff_number gardenstuffNumber, g.gardenstuff_address gardenstuffAddress, g.gardenstuff_time gardenstuffTime, p.peasant_name peasantName FROM gardenstuff AS g, peasant AS p WHERE g.gardenstuff_peasantid = p.peasant_id
ORDER BY g.gardenstuff_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
